summary: Add new monsters and npcs to the leveled list and replace some of them too
descriptionHtml:
After a lot of work its done to half
Bandits, Warlocks, Forsworns have now the power to scare you
Some npcs are replaced , and the leveled list is changed


Dawnguard and the Original Monster Mod are essential

Q: Why not the newer Monster Mod? No, the newer monster mod has not the hellhounds!
here is the link http://www.moddb.com/mods/skymomod-v12/downloads/skymomod-v12

Installation : place the files in your skyrim Data folder, thats all

Ultimate Encounters adds new changes in the gameplay, many new encounters.
Dont worry if you like the existing encounters, you will face them too.

You can meet few followers too, 2 in the Blue Palace, 1 Palace of Kings , 2 Entarance to Whiterun

Credits: Vicn, lifestorock, AlphaWolF ,CrushOverwrite
author: ColdWinter111
